text: Ob etoy i budushchey zhizni. Oni sprashivayut tebya o sirotakh. Otvechay: "Uluchshat' ikh dela - blagoye deyaniye". Yesli zhe vy ob"yedinite svoye i ikh imushchestvo, to oni - vashi brat'ya. Allakh razlichayet nechestivtsa ot tvoryashchego blagoye delo. Yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to On udruchil by vas [, zapretiv ob"yedineniye]. Voistinu, Allakh - velik, mudr
